definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Have you got an email address?
How to apply for a free mailbox ?
sentences.chinese: 如何申請一個免費的電子郵箱？

sentences.english: Password All 3 levels temporary password will be sent to your primary email account.
sentences.chinese: 全部3層的密碼會發送到您的電子郵箱。

sentences.english: People despised it so much it nearly killed e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 人們如此討厭垃圾郵件，差點就扼殺了電子郵箱。

sentences.english: I will try to figure out why I *really* need nine e-mail addresses.
sentences.chinese: 我要弄清楚爲什麼我會有9個電子郵箱。

sentences.english: Sign up to be emailed a "Word of the Day" using one of the many online dictionaries.
sentences.chinese: 通過某個網絡字典用電子郵箱訂閱“每日一詞”。

sentences.english: The sales clerk had sent it to Ms. Michel by e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 銷售員已經將發票發到Michel的電子郵箱了。

sentences.english: Magazines these days receive the bulk of their reader correspondence through e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 如今，雜誌社通過電子郵箱來閱讀大量的讀者反饋。

sentences.english: Around 78% of the US population has at least a home based email account.
sentences.chinese: 78%的美國人擁有至少一個家庭基本電子郵箱賬戶。

definition: see 無記名|无记名[wu2 ji4 ming2]
